title: SigScale CGF: Records on the Bx interface for SMS

SCSMORecord.description: Short message service center (SCS) mobile originated charging data record (CDR).

sMSNodeAddress.description: E.164 number assigned to the SMSC that produced the record.

recipientInfo.description: Indicates the recpients of a Short Message (SM).

servedIMEI.description: The international mobile equipment identity (IMEI) of the equipment served.

eventtimestamp.description: Indicates the time of the event that triggered the generation of charging information for the SMS transaction.

messageReference.description: Unique number allocated by the Mobile Station (MS) when transmitting a short message to the SC.

sMTotalNumber.description: The total number of short messages when the SMS is part of concatenated short message.

sMSequenceNumber.description: The sequence number of the SMS within a concatenated short message.

messageSize.description: Length of the user data part of the Short Message.

sMdeliveryReportRequested.description: Indicates whether a delivery report is requested by the Short Message originator.

sMDataCodingScheme.description: Indicates the data coding scheme used within the Short Message

sMReplyPathRequested.description: Indicates whether a reply Short Message to an original Short Message shall follow the same path,

sMUserDataHeader.description: The user data header extracted from the user data of the SM (TP-UDH) (TS 23.040).

userLocationInfo.description: Information about the location of the subscriber during the SMS transaction (TS 29.061).

SCSMTRecord.description: Short message service center (SCS) mobile terminated charging data record (CDR).

SCDVTT4Record.description: Short message service center (SCS) device triggering on T4 interface (DVT-T4) charging data record (CDR).

ISMSMORecord.description: IP short message gateway (IP-SM-GW) mobile originating charging data record (CDR).

ISMSMTRecord.description: IP short message gateway (IP-SM-GW) mobile terminating charging data record (CDR).

natureOfAddress.description: Indicates the scope of the address value.

numberingPlan.description: Describes which numbering plan is used.

OriginatorInfo.description: Provides information about the Originator of a Short Message.

originatorIMSI.description: The international mobile subscriber identity (IMSI) of the originating party.

originatorMSISDN.description: The mobile station ISDN number (MSISDN) of the originating party.

RecipientInfo.description: Provides information about the Recipient of a Short Message.

recipientIMSI.description: The international mobile subscriber identity (IMSI) of the receiving party.

recipientMSISDN.description: The mobile station ISDN number (MSISDN) of the receiving party.

SMAddressInfo.description: Addressee of an originator/recipient of a Short Message other than IMSI and MSISDN (e.g. short code, email).

SMInterface.description: Describes an interface on which a Short Message was originated/received by the SMS node

LocalSequenceNumber.description: Sequence number of the charging record in the node.

SMMessageType.description: Indicates the message type that triggered the generation of charging information.

RATType.description: Holds the value of RAT Type, as provided to SGW and PGW (TS 29.061).
